## Pitch your research!

- More realistic setting
- Variables:
    - 1 continuous dependent variable
    - 2 or 3 independent variables 
        - categorical or quantitative (1 or 2 of each type)
- Measurable by questionnaire (max. 5 minutes)
- No sensitive content/experimental manipulation
